src:
PBNU yang Kini Hangat ke FPI
01 Nov 2019, 07:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Hubungan Pengurus Besar Nahdhatul Ulama (PB NU) dan Front Pembela Islam (FPI) kerap mengalami panas dingin. Dulu, NU kerap berseteru dengan FPI karena berbagai masalah. Namun, hubungan NU dan FPI kini mulai menghangat.
Hubungan panas dingin NU dan FPI memang sudah berlangsung lama. Beberapa komponen NU, kerap meminta FPI agar dibubarkan karena kerap dinilai sering menebarkan kekerasan. Banser, yang merupakan badan otonom NU dari GP Ansor, juga pernah adu bentrok dengan FPI. Bahkan, Ketum PBNU Saiq Aqil Siroj pun pernah menyindir Imam Besar FPI Habib Rizieq Shihab.
Pada Kamis (31/10/2019) detikcom merangkum hubungan panas dingin NU-FPI itu. Berikut ini daftarnya:
text:
PBNU, Now Warm to FPI
Nov 01 2019, 07:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The relationship between the Nahdhatul Ulama Executive Board (PB NU) and the Islamic Defenders Front (FPI) often experiences chills. In the past, NU often clashed with FPI due to various problems. However, the relationship between NU and FPI is now beginning to warm up.
The relationship between NU and FPI has been going on for a long time. Several components of NU often demanded that the FPI be disbanded because it was often seen as often causing violence. Banser, who is an NU autonomous body from GP Ansor, also had a clash with FPI. In fact, PBNU Chairman Saiq Aqil Siroj had once quipped the FPI High Priest Habib Rizieq Shihab.
On Thursday (10/31/2019) AFP summarized the NU-FPI hot and cold relationship. Here is the list:
